title: ‘What The Hell Just Happened?’ Strade Bianche Peloton Shocked by Tadej Pogacar’s Dominant Victory
content:
Demoralized contenders react to Pogačar's display of savagery and recount an afternoon of racing with resignation and exhaustion.

Read the full article at ‘What The Hell Just Happened?’ Strade Bianche Peloton Shocked by Tadej Pogacar’s Dominant Victory on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
